bulletList.title: Add your details
bulletList.descriptionMd: Tell us about yourself. If you hold properties through a company, we’ll need information on that.
bulletList.descriptionSm: Tell us about yourself. If you hold properties through a company, we’ll need information on that.

bulletList.title: Tell us about your properties
bulletList.descriptionMd: Let us know some basic information about your properties, like the address, unit size, and rent.
bulletList.descriptionSm: Let us know some basic information about your properties.

bulletList.title: Sign the management agreement
bulletList.descriptionMd: Read, review, and sign our management agreement. Once completed, a copy is available within your Condoo account.
bulletList.descriptionSm: Our management agreement will be sent to all property title holders.
